titleStmt.title: The Dissenters case about the five hundred pounds forfeiture upon such as accepted employments under the late King without being qualified, modestly enquired into.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.C. and sold by R. Baldwine,

notesStmt.note: "Humbly recommended to the consideration of the honorable House of Commons."
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
